plays.text: Goal scored by Geoff Sanderson assisted by Rostislav Klesla and Andrew Cassels
Goal scored by David Legwand assisted by Scott Hartnell and Andreas Johansson
Penalty to Jaroslav Spacek 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Mike Sillinger 2 minutes for Hooking(opposing player not identified)
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice
Penalty to Rick Nash 2 minutes for Diving Andrew Cassels
